casebody.data:
Keith W. LORENZEN, et al., Plaintiffs, v. SOUTH CENTRAL BELL TELEPHONE COMPANY, Defendant-Third Party Plaintiff-Appellee, v. CLEARVIEW OF CLINTON, INC., Third Party Defendant-Appellant. No. 82-4348

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 28, 1983. Downey & Brown, Jackson, Miss., Rexford T. Brown, Jackson, Miss., for Clearview of Clinton, Inc. Butler, Snow, O’Mara, Stevens & Canna-da, W. Scott Welch, III, George H. Butler, Roger M. Flynt, Jr., Jackson, Miss., for South Central Bell Telephone Co. Before RUBIN, REAVLEY and GAR-WOOD, Circuit Judges. ALVIN B. RUBIN, Circuit Judge:

AFFIRMED for the reasons given by the district court. 546 F.Supp. 694 (S.D.Miss.1982).
